paragraphs.first: I'm Caio Maciel, a Data Engineer and FullStack Developer with over 5 years of experience building robust, scalable and performance-driven solutions. I love data, well-crafted APIs and clean architecture, and that shows up in every project I build, from pipelines with Airflow, dbt and BigQuery to modern applications in TypeScript, Go and Python.
paragraphs.second: Away from the keyboard I'm passionate about sports (mainly volleyball üèê), music (from sertanejo to Bruno Mars üéµ), playing guitar and good conversations. I believe technology is a bridge, and my goal is to build paths that connect data, people and real results.

ticker.label: Core stack
ticker.hint: Hover to pause and explore the tools I use daily.

airflow.title: Resilient pipelines at Datahub
airflow.summary: Refreshed and optimized Apache Airflow DAGs with modularization, versioning and coding standards.
airflow.impact: Introduced multithreading in critical flows and reinforced traceability, structured logging and data security.
airflow.metrics: Loads of roughly 1 million records now finish 10 hours faster.

airbyte.title: Modern Data Stack at Avod Tech
airbyte.summary: Designed and implemented an Airbyte-centric architecture inside the Modern Data Stack.
airbyte.impact: Paired Airflow, Airbyte, dbt and BigQuery to sustain reliable ingest pipelines.
airbyte.metrics: The standardized stack preserved governance, data quality and accessibility.

dbt.title: Analytical modeling with dbt
dbt.summary: Modeled analytical datasets with dbt and aligned transformations across squads.
dbt.impact: Optimized queries and cut storage costs by controlling dependencies.
dbt.metrics: Storage spend dropped as queries were streamlined.

bigquery.title: BigQuery powering the warehouse
bigquery.summary: Structured the data warehouse on BigQuery to back scalable, efficient pipelines.
bigquery.impact: Hooked Airflow/Airbyte ingestions into dbt-transformed layers.
bigquery.metrics: Ingestion time was reduced by 50% after the overhaul.

postgresql.title: PostgreSQL backbone for Suvinil
postgresql.summary: Maintained Node.js, AWS Lambda and PostgreSQL integrations for the client backend.
postgresql.impact: Fixed critical bugs and kept the application aligned with business needs.

datalakes.title: PostgreSQL-to-data-lake migration
datalakes.summary: Led the migration of PostgreSQL workloads to data lakes and cloud environments.
datalakes.impact: Ensured governance, data quality and accessibility stayed intact along the journey.
datalakes.metrics: Governance and access controls remained enforced after the migration.

python.title: Python pipelines revitalized
python.summary: Refactored critical Python processes focused on ingestion and transformation.
python.impact: Strengthened traceability, logging and security while reviewing legacy pipelines.
python.metrics: Architecture upgrades improved scalability and maintainability.

golang.title: Golang services at GoFlux
golang.summary: Built backend services in Golang (Fiber) for freight, negotiation and stock-exchange data.
golang.impact: Acted as technical lead defining architecture and running code reviews.
golang.metrics: Led a squad with 7 devs, 1 UX and 1 QA.

nestjs.title: Scalable NestJS APIs
nestjs.summary: Crafted scalable NestJS (Node.js) APIs for GoFlux products.
nestjs.impact: Embedded clean code and SOLID practices across the team.
nestjs.metrics: Projects handled complex freight, negotiation and exchange datasets.

nextjs.title: Next.js frontend for Suvinil
nextjs.summary: Supported and evolved the client's Next.js frontend.
nextjs.impact: Fixed critical bugs and ensured continuous delivery inside an agile setup.

typescript.title: TypeScript across backend and frontend
typescript.project: GoFlux logistics squad & Ioasys ¬∑ Suvinil project
typescript.summary: Built NestJS/Node APIs and maintained the Next.js frontend with TypeScript end to end.
typescript.impact: Acted as tech lead with code reviews, standardized docs and critical bug fixes.
typescript.metrics: Squad of 7 devs, 1 UX, 1 QA; production stability +10% and onboarding -30%.

react.title: React frontend for Suvinil
react.summary: Supported and evolved the client's Next.js (React) portal.
react.impact: Fixed critical bugs and kept documentation aligned with the agile team.
react.metrics: Production stability rose 10% and onboarding dropped 30%.

vue.title: Vue.js frontend for live streams
vue.summary: Built the Vue.js frontend integrated with Laravel, Node.js and MySQL.
vue.impact: Worked in a Kanban setup focused on streamer monetization.
vue.metrics: Optimizations increased ad revenue for partners.

laravel.title: Laravel services for advertising
laravel.summary: Implemented Laravel services sustaining ad flows for live streams.
laravel.impact: Orchestrated integrations with Node.js, Vue.js and MySQL.
laravel.metrics: Ad management was optimized to grow monetization.

mysql.title: MySQL modeling at W7M
mysql.summary: Modeled and maintained the MySQL database powering the product.
mysql.impact: Kept data consistent across Laravel, Node.js and Vue.js services.
mysql.metrics: Database tuning enabled better ad management for streamers.

dotnet.title: .NET backends for industrial systems
dotnet.summary: Developed .NET backends that integrated factory applications.
dotnet.impact: Implemented SOAP webservices to connect the plant systems.
dotnet.metrics: Also handled technical support and onboarding for new devs.
